TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: The Revolution Watch Advisor screen is totally customisable in the same way as the Domestic Advisor Screen.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: l'Ecran de Conseiller de Révolution est entièrement configurable de la même manière que l'écran du Conseiller Domestique (CDA).
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: The Revolution Watch Advisor screen is totally customisable in the same way as the Domestic Advisor Screen.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: La schermata del Consigliere Rivoluzionario è completamente personalizzabile come lo schermata del Consigliere Interno.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: La pantalla del Consejero de la Revolución es totalmente personalizable de la misma forma que la pantalla del Consejero de Interior.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: The Revolution Watch Advisor screen is totally customisable in the same way as the Domestic Advisor Screen.

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Customise the Revolution Watch Advisor to suit your playing style and imagination! Put the culture level column next to the Revolution trend column, it doesn't matter!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Personnalisez l'Ecran de Conseiller de Révolution pour l'adapter à votre style de Jeu! Placez le niveau de Culture tout de suite à côté de la tendance de Revolution, peu importe!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Customise the Revolution Watch Advisor to suit your playing style and imagination! Put the culture level column next to the Revolution trend column, it doesn't matter!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Personalizza la schermata del Consigliere Rivoluzionario per adattarla al tuo stile di gioco ed immaginazione! Inserisci la colonna del livello culturale vicino a quella della tendenza alla rivolta. non ti preoccupare!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: ¡Personaliza la pantalla del Consejero de la Revolución para ajustarlo a tu estilo de juego! Coloca la columna del nivel cultural junto a la del estado de la Revolución, ¡nadie se va a quejar!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Customise the Revolution Watch Advisor to suit your playing style and imagination! Put the culture level column next to the Revolution trend column, it doesn't matter!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: The Revolution Watch Advisor can also display important buildings constructed in a city that are relevant to Revolutions, especially cultural buildings like wonders, and theatres!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: l'Ecran de Conseiller de Révolution peut également afficher les bâtiments construits, ayant une influence pour la stabilité de l'Empire, particulièrement les bâtiments culturels (Merveilles, théatres,...)
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: The Revolution Watch Advisor can also display important buildings constructed in a city that are relevant to Revolutions, especially cultural buildings like wonders, and theatres!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: La schermata del Consigliere Rivoluzionario può mostrare edifici cittadini rilevanti per 'Revolutions', tipo edifici culturali come Meraviglie e Teatri!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: El Consejero de la Revolución puede mostrar también edificios importantes construidos en una ciudad que es relevante para 'Revolutions', especialmente edificios culturales como maravillas y teatros.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: The Revolution Watch Advisor can also display important buildings constructed in a city that are relevant to Revolutions, especially cultural buildings like wonders, and theatres!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: City bribing can be initiated from the city screen or the Revolutions Watch Advisor screen.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: La Corruption de la Ville peut être ordonnée depuis l'écran de Ville ou l'Ecran de Conseiller de Révolution.
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: City bribing can be initiated from the city screen or the Revolutions Watch Advisor screen.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Puoi tentare una 'donazione' per una città dalla schermata cittadina o da quella del Consigliere Rivoluzionario.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Se puede sobornar a los ciudadanos tanto desde la pantalla de ciudad como desde la pantalla del Consejero de la Revolución.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: City bribing can be initiated from the city screen or the Revolutions Watch Advisor screen.

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: The civ info screen can now graph the overall revolt stability of your empire, or your enemies empire! You just need sufficient espionage points...
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: L'Ecran d'informations affiche maintenant un graphique de la stabilité de chaque Empire. Il faut juste suffisamment de points d'espionnage...
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: The civ info screen can now graph the overall revolt stability of your empire, or your enemies empire! You just need sufficient espionage points...
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: la 'Schermata delle informazioni' ora può rappresentare graficamente la stabilità complessiva del tuo impero o degli imperi nemici! Hai solo bisogno di sufficienti punti spionaggio...
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *:La pantalla de información de la civilización puede mostrar gráficos sobre el estado de las revueltas a lo largo de tu imperio, ¡o del imperio de tus enemigos! Tan solo necesitas los suficientes puntos de espionaje...
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: The civ info screen can now graph the overall revolt stability of your empire, or your enemies empire! You just need sufficient espionage points...

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Pay attention to the underlying rebellion issues in your city! If the citizens are sick of slavery, you may need to do something about it or accept the consequences!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Prêtez attention à l'état de rebellion de votre Ville! Si les citoyens sont outrés par l'esclavage, il vous faudra soit faire quelque chose, soit en accepter les conséquences!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Pay attention to the underlying rebellion issues in your city! If the citizens are sick of slavery, you may need to do something about it or accept the consequences!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Presta attenzione ai motivi di rivolta della tua città! Se i cittadini sono stanchi della schiavitù, potrebbe essere necessario fare qualcosa al riguardo o accettarne le conseguenze!!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: ¡Presta atención a los motivos subyacentes de la rebelión! Si los ciudadanos están hartos de la esclavitud, deberías hacer algo al respecto ... ¡o aceptar las consecuencias!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Pay attention to the underlying rebellion issues in your city! If the citizens are sick of slavery, you may need to do something about it or accept the consequences!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Play Revolutions with an experimental mindset. Cause and effect are not necessarily immediately obvious...
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Jouez à Revolutions aec un état d'esprit nouveau : les Causes et les Effets ne sont pas forcément immédiatement évident...
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Play Revolutions with an experimental mindset. Cause and effect are not necessarily immediately obvious...
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Gioca 'Revolutions' con atteggiamento aperto ad ogni esperimento. Causa ed effetto non sono necessariamente quelli che ci si aspetterebbe a prima vista...
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Mantén la mente abierta cuando juegues a Revolutions. Causa y efecto no tienen por qué ser inmediatamente obvios
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Play Revolutions with an experimental mindset. Cause and effect are not necessarily immediately obvious...

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you decide to go to war, make sure you have the peoples support! If you have chosen a bad target or get bogged down in the war, the people may drop their support for you!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Si vous décidez de partir à la Guerre, soyez sûrs d'avoir le soutien du peuple! Si vous choisissez une mauvaise cible ou vous enlisez dans la guerre, le peuple pourrait se retourner contre vous!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you decide to go to war, make sure you have the peoples support! If you have chosen a bad target or get bogged down in the war, the people may drop their support for you!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Se decidi di andare in guerra, assicurati il consenso popolare! Se hai scelto il bersaglio sbagliato o resti impantanato nella guerra, il popolo potrebbe toglierti il suo sostegno!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *:Si decides ir a la guerra, ¡asegúrate que la gente te apoya! Si te topas con un hueso duro de roer o quedas enzarzado en una lucha sin avances, ¡tu pueblo puede decidir retirarte su apoyo!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you decide to go to war, make sure you have the peoples support! If you have chosen a bad target or get bogged down in the war, the people may drop their support for you!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Running a deficit economy for too long, can make the people's approval of you decline. If you destroy the economy, you could well be destroyed!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Avoir une économie en déficit pendant trop longtemps peut avoir des conséquences néfastes pour votre popularité. Si vous détruisez votre économie, vous risquez d'être vous-même détruit!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Running a deficit economy for too long, can make the people's approval of you decline. If you destroy the economy, you could well be destroyed!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Se l'economia del tuo impero rimane in perdita per troppo tempo, può far crollare il consenso popolare. Se distruggi l'economia, potrai essere distrutto a tua volta!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *:Aplicar una encomia deficitaria durante largos periodos de tiempo puede hacer que tu popularidad caiga por los suelos. Si destruyes la economía, ¡puede que seas tú lo siguiente en ser destruido!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Running a deficit economy for too long, can make the people's approval of you decline. If you destroy the economy, you could well be destroyed!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Spend a surplus wisely. If you waste it, you may not have the money to buy bribes or pay for civic infrastructure vital to keep the people placid.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Utilisez votre trésor intelligemment. Si vous le gaspillez, vous pourriez être à cours d'or pour corrompre ou payer des infrastructures vitales pour garder le peuple passif.
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Spend a surplus wisely. If you waste it, you may not have the money to buy bribes or pay for civic infrastructure vital to keep the people placid.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Investi saggiamente i tuoi guadagni. Se li sprechi, resterai senza il denaro per corrompere o per mantenere le infrastrutture essenziali a mantenere tranquillo il popolo.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Gasta tu tesoro sabiamente. Si lo desperdicias, puede que no tengas dinero para sobornar a los ciudadanos o establecer nuevas infraestructuras vitales para mantener a la gente tranquila.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Spend a surplus wisely. If you waste it, you may not have the money to buy bribes or pay for civic infrastructure vital to keep the people placid.

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Think of yourself at all times as being a servant of your people. They are your boss, whether you are running a democracy or a dictatorship!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Considérez-vous toujours comme un serviteur de votre peuple. Ils sont votre patron, que vous soyez en démocratie ou Chef de la Dictature!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Think of yourself at all times as being a servant of your people. They are your boss, whether you are running a democracy or a dictatorship!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Pensa sempre a te stesso come servitore del tuo popolo. Sono loro il tuo vero capo, sia in democrazia che in dittatura!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Imagínate siempre como un siervo del pueblo. Ellos son los jefes, ¡sin importar si eres un demócrata o un dictador!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Think of yourself at all times as being a servant of your people. They are your boss, whether you are running a democracy or a dictatorship!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: In Revolutions, your potential opponent is not just your rival civ, but your own people...
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Dans Révolutions, votre adversaire potentiel n'est pas uniquement une Civ rivale, mais également votre propre peuple...
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: In Revolutions, your potential opponent is not just your rival civ, but your own people..
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: In 'Revolutions', il nemico potenziale non è solo una delle civiltà rivali, ma il tuo stesso popolo..
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: En Revolutions, tu enemigo potencial no son solo las civilizaciones rivales, sino también tu propio pueblo...
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: In Revolutions, your potential opponent is not just your rival civ, but your own people...

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If your overall empire domestic stability is good, the world is your oyster!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Si la stabilité globale de votre Empire est bonne, le Monde est votre huître!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If your overall empire domestic stability is good, the world is your oyster!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Se la stabilità del tuo impero è buona, il mondo è il tuo giardino!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *:Si la estabilidad general de los asuntos internos de tu impero es buena, ¡el mundo es tu ostra! (N. del T. Expresión inglesa similar a ¡el mundo está a tus pies!)
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If your overall empire domestic stability is good, the world is your oyster!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: When you have domestic problems, think of what has happened in real history to deal with those problems. It is no different in the game!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Lorsque vous avez des problèmes internes, pensez à ce qui s'est passé dans l'Histoire pour résoudre ces problèmes. Ce n'est pas différent dans le Jeu!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: When you have domestic problems, think of what has happened in real history to deal with those problems. It is no different in the game!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Se hai problemi interni, considera come sono stati gestiti gli stessi problemi nella Storia reale. Non c'è differenza nel gioco!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Cuando tengas problemas internos en tu imperio, piensa en lo que ha ocurrido en la historia real y como se solucionó. ¡No es muy distinto en el juego!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: When you have domestic problems, think of what has happened in real history to deal with those problems. It is no different in the game!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: At some point, underlying rebellion can explode into violence no matter what you do. Be ready with law enforcement troops if needed!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: D'une certaine façon, la rébellion peut parfois exploser de manière violente indépendemment de vos actions. Soyez prêts à renforcer vos armées si nécessaire!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: At some point, underlying rebellion can explode into violence no matter what you do. Be ready with law enforcement troops if needed!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Ad un certo punto, la rivolta può scoppiare in violenze, indipendentemente da quello che cerchi di fare! Sii pronto ad usare l'esercito per riportare l'ordine, se occorre!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: En algún momento, los fuegos de la revolución pueden explotar desencadenando la violencia, no importa lo que hagas. ¡Ten preparadas a las tropas para restablecer el orden si es necesario!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: At some point, underlying rebellion can explode into violence no matter what you do. Be ready with law enforcement troops if needed!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you face a revolt, don't panic. So long as you are not in the middle of a foreign war, you can apply military force on the rebels and gain experience!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Si vous faites face à une révolte, ne paniquez pas. Dans que vous n'êtes pas impliquez dans une autre Guerre, vous pouvez utiliser vos forces militaires contre les rebelles et gagner de l'expérience!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you face a revolt, don't panic. So long as you are not in the middle of a foreign war, you can apply military force on the rebels and gain experience!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Se affronti una rivolta, stai calmo. Finché non ti troverai coinvolto in una guerra con civiltà straniere, puoi usare la tua forza militare contro i ribelli e acquisire esperienza!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Si te enfrentas a una revuelta, no pierdas los nervios. Mientras que no te encuentres inmerso en una guerra con otra civilización, puedes dedicar todos tus recursos militares a aplastar a los rebeldes, ¡y ganaras experiencia!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you face a revolt, don't panic. So long as you are not in the middle of a foreign war, you can apply military force on the rebels and gain experience!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: To protect your unstable cities, make sure you have law enforcement entrenched, and law enforcement units around the city too! Rebels will burn the countryside not just the city!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Pour protéger vos Villes instables, soyez sûrs d'avoir suffisamment de troupes, à la fois pour la Ville et pour ses alentours! Les Rebelles brûlerons la campagne, pas uniquement la Ville!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: To protect your unstable cities, make sure you have law enforcement entrenched, and law enforcement units around the city too! Rebels will burn the countryside not just the city!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Per proteggere le città in rivolta, assicura la presenza di forze militari in città, e anche nei dintorni ! I ribelli daranno saboteranno i miglioramenti esterni oltre che la città!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Para proteger tus ciudades inestables, asegúrate que tienes una presencia militar importante en la ciudad, ¡así como en los alrededores de la ciudad! Los rebeldes pueden dedicarse a quemar los campos no solo la ciudad.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: To protect your unstable cities, make sure you have law enforcement entrenched, and law enforcement units around the city too! Rebels will burn the countryside not just the city!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If a rebellion emerges, remember that not all rebels are visible. Rebel spies can do damage if you are not prepared...
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Si une rébellion émerge, souvenez-vous que tous les rebelles ne sont pas forcément visibles : des espions peuvent également causer des dommages si vous n'êtes pas préparés...
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If a rebellion emerges, remember that not all rebels are visible. Rebel spies can do damage if you are not prepared...
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Se scoppia una rivolta, ricorda che non tutti i ribelli saranno visibili. Spie ribelli potranno far danni, se non sei preparato...
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Si aparece una revolución, recuerda que no todos los rebeldes son visibles. Los espías rebeldes pueden hacer mucho daño si no estás preparado...
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If a rebellion emerges, remember that not all rebels are visible. Rebel spies can do damage if you are not prepared...

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you are overthrown and the citizens demand a new leader, it is not all bad. You will loose control of your empire for a time, but after this time you will have a new and interesting scenario to deal with.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Si vous êtes renversé et que les citoyens demandent un nouveau Leader, ce n'est pas forcément mauvais. Vous allez perdre le contrôle de votre Empire pour un temps, mais vous allez ensuite avoir un nouveau scénario tout aussi intéressant à mener.
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you are overthrown and the citizens demand a new leader, it is not all bad. You will loose control of your empire for a time, but after this time you will have a new and interesting scenario to deal with.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Se sei spodestato e i cittadini richiedono un nuovo leader, non va tutto male. Perderai il controllo del tuo impero per un po', ma dopo avrai un nuovo ed interessante scenario da affrontare.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Si eres derrocado y los ciudadanos demandan un nuevo líder, no está todo perdido. Perderás el control de tu imperio durante un tiempo, pero después de ese tiempo, te estarás enfrentando a un nuevo e interesante escenario.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you are overthrown and the citizens demand a new leader, it is not all bad. You will loose control of your empire for a time, but after this time you will have a new and interesting scenario to deal with.

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Bribing dissidents and city officials can buy you important time to deal with regional discontent!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Corrompre les dissidents et les politiques peut vous acheter du temps crucial, pour gérer les contentieux régionaux!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Bribing dissidents and city officials can buy you important time to deal with regional discontent!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Corrompere dissidenti e comandanti cittadini può farti guadagnare tempo importante per affrontare il malcontento regionale!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Sobornar a los disidentes y a los oficiales de la ciudad, ¡puede conseguirte un tiempo precioso para lidiar con el descontento regional!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Bribing dissidents and city officials can buy you important time to deal with regional discontent!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you decide that you need to deal with rebellion with bribery, remember that your corruption does not go unwatched...
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Si vous décidez de gérer la rébellion par la corruption, souvenez-vous que ces actes ne sont pas invisibles...
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you decide that you need to deal with rebellion with bribery, remember that your corruption does not go unwatched...
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Se decidi di trattare con i ribelli usando il denaro, ricorda che la tua corruzione non passerà inosservata...
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Si eliges lidiar con una revuelta por medio de los sobornos, recuerda que la corrupción que generes no pasara inadvertida...
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you decide that you need to deal with rebellion with bribery, remember that your corruption does not go unwatched...

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Bribery is an important strategic element in advanced Revolutions play.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: La Corruption est un élément stratéqieu important dans le Jeu avec Revolutions.
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Bribery is an important strategic element in advanced Revolutions play.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: La corruzione è un elemento fondamentele di strategia nel gioco avanzato con 'Revolutions'.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *:Los sobornos son un importante elemento estratégico en el juego avanzado de Revolutions.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Bribery is an important strategic element in advanced Revolutions play.

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you pay out cash to one city in order to keep it quiet, other cities may increase their disloyalty too...unless you pay up to them as well!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Si vous payez une Ville pour la réduire au silence, les autres Villes pourraient se montrer de moins en moins loyales également...jusqu'à que vous ayez à payer pour toutes!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you pay out cash to one city in order to keep it quiet, other cities may increase their disloyalty too...unless you pay up to them as well!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Se cominci a pagare una città per mantenere la calma, altre città potranno aumentare il loro dissenso, fino quando non pagherai anche loro!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Si repartes dinero en una ciudad para mantener el orden, otras ciudades podrian incrementar su deslealtad tambien.... ¡a no ser que les pagues tambien a ellos!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you pay out cash to one city in order to keep it quiet, other cities may increase their disloyalty too...unless you pay up to them as well!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Beware of the Domino Effect...If one city rebels, this can cascade into a regional or empire wide rebellion!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Attention à l'Effet Domino...Si une Ville se rebelle, cela peut se propager en une rebellion régionale, voire une révolution dans tout l'Empire!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Beware of the Domino Effect...If one city rebels, this can cascade into a regional or empire wide rebellion!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Attenzione all'Effetto Domino... Se in una città scoppia la rivolta, questa si potrà diffondere su scala regionale o anche nazionale!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *:Ten cuidado del efecto Domino... Si una ciudad se rebela, puede generar una cascada de rebeliones regionales, ¡o incluso a lo largo de todo tu imperio!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Beware of the Domino Effect...If one city rebels, this can cascade into a regional or empire wide rebellion!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If a rebel movement has taken control of parts of your empire, do not be frustrated! Patiently wait until the time is right and hit back at the rebellion with your loyal army!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Si un mouvement de rebellion a pris le contrôle d'une partie de votre Empire, ne soyez pas frustrés! Attendez patiemment le bon moment et frappé cette rebellion avec votre armée loyale!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If a rebel movement has taken control of parts of your empire, do not be frustrated! Patiently wait until the time is right and hit back at the rebellion with your loyal army!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Se un fronte rivoluzionario prende il controllo di una parte del tuo dominio, non essere frustrato! Aspetta pazientemente il momento adatto per colpire la rivolta con il tuo leale esercito!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *:Si un movimiento rebelde ha tomado el control de una parte de tu imperio, calma y serenidad. Espera pacientemente al momento oportuno y ¡aplasta a los rebeldes con la fuerza tu ejército leal!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If a rebel movement has taken control of parts of your empire, do not be frustrated! Patiently wait until the time is right and hit back at the rebellion with your loyal army!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If parts of your empire have broken away under independent rule, make sure their leaders do not side with your enemies!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Si des parties de votre Empire ont fini par obtenir l'indépendance, faites attention à ce qu'elles ne s'allient pas à vos ennemis!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If parts of your empire have broken away under independent rule, make sure their leaders do not side with your enemies!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Se una parte del tuo impero ha ottenuto l'indipendenza, assicurati che il suo leader non si allei con i tuoi nemici!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Si una parte de tu imperio se ha independizado, ¡asegúrate al menos que se alíen con tus enemigos!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If parts of your empire have broken away under independent rule, make sure their leaders do not side with your enemies!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: The speed of city growth is an important element in controlling the stability of your empire. Grow too big too fast and their will be rogue elements emerging, be sure of that!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: La vitesse de croissance de vos Villes est un élément important dans le contrôle de la stabilité de votre Empire. Croître trop grand ou trop vite peut entraîner à coup sûr des événements de révolte!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: The speed of city growth is an important element in controlling the stability of your empire. Grow too big too fast and their will be rogue elements emerging, be sure of that!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: La velocità di crescita delle città è un elemento fondamentale per la stabilità del tuo impero. Se crescono troppo e troppo in fretta, si presenteranno i dissidenti, stanne certo!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: La velocidad de crecimiento de las ciudades es una pieza importante a la hora de controlar la estabilidad de tu imperio. Crece demasiado deprisa y habrá disidentes por doquier, ¡tenlo por seguro!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: The speed of city growth is an important element in controlling the stability of your empire. Grow too big too fast and their will be rogue elements emerging, be sure of that!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: The speed of city growth is one important aspect of advanced Revolutions game play. Keep city growth capped if need be, but not too long either!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: La croissance de la ville est un aspect important des jeu avec Revolution. Contrôlez et ralentissez la croissance si nécessaire, mais pas trop longtemps non plus!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: The speed of city growth is one important aspect of advanced Revolutions game play. Keep city growth capped if need be, but not too long either!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: La velocità di crescita delle città è un aspetto importante del gioco avanzato in 'Revolutions'. Se necessario mantienila limitata, ma non per troppo tempo!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: La velocidad de crecimiento de las ciudades es un aspecto importante de una partida avanzada en Revolutions. Mantén restringido el crecimiento de las ciudades si es necesario, ¡pero tampoco te pases!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: The speed of city growth is one important aspect of advanced Revolutions game play. Keep city growth capped if need be, but not too long either!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: The loyalty of the citizenry is more easily kept in check in a tightly knit well connected empire.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: La loyauté du peuple est assurée plus facilement dans un Empire très uni et bien relié.
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: The loyalty of the citizenry is more easily kept in check in a tightly knit well connected empire.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: La fedeltà dei cittadini è più facile da tenere sotto controllo in un solido e ben collegato impero.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *:La lealtad de la ciudadanía es más fácil de mantener a raya en un imperio conectado eficientemente.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: The loyalty of the citizenry is more easily kept in check in a tightly knit well connected empire.

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Without question, the most difficult aspect of Revolutions management, is the issue of distant settlements and colonies. These need special attention.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Sans aucun doute, l'aspect le plus difficile dans Revolution est la gestion des Villes distantes et des colonies. Elles nécessitent une attention toute particulière.
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Without question, the most difficult aspect of Revolutions management, is the issue of distant settlements and colonies. These need special attention.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Senza dubbio, l'aspetto più difficile in 'Revolutions', è la gestione di colonie ed insediamenti lontani. Questi hanno bisogno di un'attenzione speciale.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Sin lugar a dudas, el aspecto más complicado a manejar en Revolutions, es el tema de los asentamientos lejanos y las colonias. Van a necesitar constante atención y cuidado.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Without question, the most difficult aspect of Revolutions management, is the issue of distant settlements and colonies. These need special attention.

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: It is a common misconception that you cannot expand into a mighty global empire under Revolutions. You can! You just have to do it right!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: C'est une erreur fréquente de croire qu'il n'est pas possible de gérer un vaste Empire avec 'Revolution'. C'est possible! il faut juste le faire bien!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: It is a common misconception that you cannot expand into a mighty global empire under Revolutions. You can! You just have to do it right!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: E' un equivoco diffuso che non sia possibile espandere un potente impero mondiale in 'Revolutions'. Si può! Devi solo farlo bene!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Es un error muy común pensar que no puedes expandirte y formar un vasto imperio global en Revolutions. ¡Si que puedes! Solo que tienes que hacerlo muy bien.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: It is a common misconception that you cannot expand into a mighty global empire under Revolutions. You can! You just have to do it right!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: War gathers it's own momentum, not just in conquest, but in the approval of your citizens. Keep it rolling with rewards for them, and they will support you!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: La Guerre peut générer son propre élan, pas uniquement par la conquête, mais aussi dans l'approbation de vos citoyens. Continuez à leur Offrir des récompenses, et ils vous soutiendront!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: War gathers it's own momentum, not just in conquest, but in the approval of your citizens. Keep it rolling with rewards for them, and they will support you!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: La guerra guadagna impulso, non solo con la conquista ma anche con l'approvazione dei cittadini. Distribuisci il bottino e loro ti daranno il loro supporto!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: La guerra tiene su propio ritmo, no solo en la conquista, sino también en la aprobación de la población. Ofréceles las mieles del triunfo, ¡y ellos continuaran apoyándote!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: War gathers it's own momentum, not just in conquest, but in the approval of your citizens. Keep it rolling with rewards for them, and they will support you!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Religion plays a huge role in the stability of your society. Try to run your civics to match the religious needs of your society.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: La Religion joue une role très important dans la stabilité de votre société. Essayez d'adapter vos Doctrines pour vous adapter aux besoins de votre société.
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Religion plays a huge role in the stability of your society. Try to run your civics to match the religious needs of your society.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: La religione svolge un ruolo enorme nella stabilità del tuo impero. Scegli forme di governo che vengano incontro alle esigenze religiose della tua società.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: La religión juega un papel muy importante en la estabilidad de tu sociedad. Intenta ajustar los principios a las necesidades religiosas de tu sociedad.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Religion plays a huge role in the stability of your society. Try to run your civics to match the religious needs of your society.

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you are faced with an empire with many different faiths, fear not! So long as you don't attempt to run a theocracy or organised religious state, the people may really respect you!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Si vous devez gérer un empire avec des croyances différentes, ne prenez pas peur! Tant que vous n'essayez pas de gouverner en Théocracie ou avec une religion d'état, le peuple peut très bien vous respecter!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you are faced with an empire with many different faiths, fear not! So long as you don't attempt to run a theocracy or organised religious state, the people may really respect you!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Se ti confronti con un impero con varie fedi diverse, non temere! Finché non scegli la 'Teocrazia' o la 'Religione Organizzata', il popolo potrà veramente rispettarti !
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Si encuentras de repente que tu imperio tiene distintas fes, ¡no temas! Mientras que no intentes imponer la Teocracia o la Religión Organizada, ¡el pueblo te respetara!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you are faced with an empire with many different faiths, fear not! So long as you don't attempt to run a theocracy or organised religious state, the people may really respect you!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you want religious purity in your empire, do it wisely but be extra vigilant to non-state religions taking hold!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Si vous voulez une pureté religieuse au sein de votre Empire, soyez très vigilant aux religions non officielles qui voudraient s'y implanter!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you want religious purity in your empire, do it wisely but be extra vigilant to non-state religions taking hold!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Se desideri la purezza religiosa nel tuo impero, fallo con saggezza, ma sii molto vigili per non far sviluppare religioni non di Stato!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Si pretendes la pureza religiosa en tu imperio, hazlo sabiamente pero mantente siempre alerta y vigila que las religiones no oficiales no asiente un pie en tu imperio.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you want religious purity in your empire, do it wisely but be extra vigilant to non-state religions taking hold!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Without question, the management of holy city sites is one of the biggest challenges in Revolutions.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Sans aucun doute, la gestion des Lieux sacrés de vos Villes est un des plus grands challenges de Revolutions.
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Without question, the management of holy city sites is one of the biggest challenges in Revolutions.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Senza dubbio, la gestione delle Città Sante è una delle maggiori sfide in 'Revolutions'.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Sin lugar a dudas, la administración de las Ciudades Santas es uno de los mayores retos en Revolutions.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Without question, the management of holy city sites is one of the biggest challenges in Revolutions.

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Under Revolutions you can hold firm more than one holy city in your empire. Two holy cities is fine, the challenge accumulates as the number of holy sites increase!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Avec Revolutions vous pouvez tenir plus d'une Ville Sainte dans votre Empire. Deux Villes Saintes c'est bien, le Challenge commence lorsque vous accumulez les villes Saintes!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Under Revolutions you can hold firm more than one holy city in your empire. Two holy cities is fine, the challenge accumulates as the number of holy sites increase!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: In 'Revolutions' puoi controllare più di una Città Santa nel tuo impero. Con due tutto andrà bene, la sfida sarà più difficile con l'aumento delle Città Sante!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: En Revolutions pues albergar a mas de una Ciudad Santa en tu imperio. Dos ciudades santas estan biem, ¡pero el reto se incrementa segun va creciendo el numero de ciudades santas!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Under Revolutions you can hold firm more than one holy city in your empire. Two holy cities is fine, the challenge accumulates as the number of holy sites increase!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: The tools you have to manage Revolutions are many. Civics, culture, surplus cash, infrastructure, wonders, military, luxuries, war success are but a few.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Les Outils pour gérer Revolutions sont nombeux : Doctrines, Culture, Or, Infrastructures, Merveilles, Armée, Ressources de Luxe en font partie.
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: The tools you have to manage Revolutions are many. Civics, culture, surplus cash, infrastructure, wonders, military, luxuries, war success are but a few.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Gli strumenti per controllare le rivolte sono tanti. Forme di governo, cultura, denaro, infrastrutture, Meraviglie, esercito, beni di lusso, vittorie militari, sono solo alcuni.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Las herramientas de las que dispones para manejar las revoluciones son muchas y diversas. Principios, cultura, maletines de dinero, infraestructuras, artículos de lujo y victorias militares son tan solo un pequeño ejemplo de ellas.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: The tools you have to manage Revolutions are many. Civics, culture, surplus cash, infrastructure, wonders, military, luxuries, war success are but a few.

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: It is a common misconception that Revolutions fundamentally changes the basic game play. It does not. It merely adds another strategic layer upon the game, the management of your people...
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: C'est une erreur de penser que Revolutions change complètement le mécanisme du jeu. Ce n'est pas le cas. Il ajoute simplement un élément stratégique supplémentaire, la gestion de votre peuple...
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: It is a common misconception that Revolutions fundamentally changes the basic game play. It does not. It merely adds another strategic layer upon the game, the management of your people...
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: E' un equivoco diffuso che 'Revolutions' modifichi sostanzialmente i meccanismi di gioco. No. Aggiunge al gioco solo un altro livello strategico, la gestione del tuo popolo ...
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Es un error frecuenta pensar que Revolutions cambia fundamentalmente los mecanismos de juego. No lo hace. Tan solo añade una capa más a la estrategia del juego, la gestión de tus gentes...
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: It is a common misconception that Revolutions fundamentally changes the basic game play. It does not. It merely adds another strategic layer upon the game, the management of your people...

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Keep in mind the distinction between the general apathetic citizenry who are dictated by happiness and health, from the dissident minorities that have their own agendas.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Gardez à l'esprit la différence entre l'apathie de la majorité des citoyens dictée par le moral et la santé, et les minorités dissidentes qui ont leur propres agendas.
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Keep in mind the distinction between the general apathetic citizenry who are dictated by happiness and health, from the dissident minorities that have their own agendas.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Tieni presente la differenza tra i comuni cittadini che sono influenzati da felicità e salute, e le minoranze dissidenti che hanno le proprie priorità.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Ten presente la diferencia entre los ciudadanos de a pie que se sienten influenciados por la felicidad y la salubridad, y aquellas minorías disidentes que poseen su propia agenda.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Keep in mind the distinction between the general apathetic citizenry who are dictated by happiness and health, from the dissident minorities that have their own agendas.

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: A city may appear to be happy, but this may only be a surface manifestation. If their are many foreign nationals, the desire for independence by force can emerge anyway!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Un Ville peut paraître heureuse, mais c'est uniquement une manifestation en surface. S'il y a beaucoup de nationalités étrangères, le désir d'indépendance par la force peut tout de même émerger!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: A city may appear to be happy, but this may only be a surface manifestation. If their are many foreign nationals, the desire for independence by force can emerge anyway!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Una città può sembrare felice, ma questa potrebbe essere solo apparenza. Se ci sono molti cittadini stranieri, può emergere un desiderio di indipendenza, anche con la forza!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Una ciudad puede parecer contenta, pero esto es solo la punta del iceberg. Si hay muchas nacionalidades extranjeras, el deseo de independencia por la fuerza aparecerá tarde o temprano.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: A city may appear to be happy, but this may only be a surface manifestation. If their are many foreign nationals, the desire for independence by force can emerge anyway!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Distant settlements need special attention. Give them extras like cultural assets, defence assets and military support to ensure that you are looking after them!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Les Villes Distantes ont besion d'attention spéciale. Donnez-leur des extras comme des éléments culturels, défensifs, et le soutien militaire nécesssaire pour leur assurer que vous les considérez!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Distant settlements need special attention. Give them extras like cultural assets, defence assets and military support to ensure that you are looking after them!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Insediamenti lontani devno essere seguiti con attenzione. Sviluppa per loro infrastrutture culturali e militari aggiuntive, per convincerli che ti prendi cura di loro!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *:Los asentamientos lejanos necesitan una especial atención. Proporcionales comodidades como infraestructuras culturales o soporte militar... ¡ para que sea palpable que te preocupas por ellos!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Distant settlements need special attention. Give them extras like cultural assets, defence assets and military support to ensure that you are looking after them!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Your citizens like constant improvements to their circumstances. Stagnation is your biggest enemy, not the people!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Vos citoyens aiment l'amélioration constante de leur quotidien. La Stagnation est votre pire ennemi, pas le peuple!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Your citizens like constant improvements to their circumstances. Stagnation is your biggest enemy, not the people!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: I cittadini apprezzano miglioramenti costanti alla loro situazione. Il tuo peggior nemico è la mancanza di sviluppo, non il popolo!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: A tus ciudadanos les encantan la constante mejora de su situación. El estancamiento es tu peor enemigo, ¡no el pueblo!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Your citizens like constant improvements to their circumstances. Stagnation is your biggest enemy, not the people!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*:In big empires, it is often better to let a city or even a region break away. The break always may be weak and exploitable.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*:Dans le Grand Empire, il est souvent mieux de laisser une ville ou région accéder à l'indépendance. Ces dissidents sont souvent faibles et exploitables.
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*:In big empires, it is often better to let a city or even a region break away. The break always may be weak and exploitable.
TEXT.Italian: *Revolutions Mod Hint*:In vasti imperi, spesso è meglio separarsi da una città o anche da una regione. La regione separata può essere debole e attaccabile.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *:En grandes imperios, a veces es mejor dar la independencia a una ciudad o incluso a una región. El nuevo estado siempre será débil y explotable.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*:In big empires, it is often better to let a city or even a region break away. The break always may be weak and exploitable.

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: In Revolutions, you may think that it is the end for a leader and a nation if they are defeated. But it may not be! Leaders will go underground and re-emerge rather than be destroyed for all time.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Dans Revolutions, vous pouvez penser que c'est la fin lorsqu'un leader ou une nation a été défaite. Ce n'est pas le cas! les Leaders vont se fondre dans l'ombre quelque temps et émerger à nouveau plutôt que d'être détruits pour toujours.
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: In Revolutions, you may think that it is the end for a leader and nation if they are defeated. But it may not be! Leaders will go underground and re-emerge rather than be destroyed for all time.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: In 'Revolutions', potresti pensare che la sconfitta rappresenta la fine di un leader e della sua nazione. Non sempre! I leader andranno in clandestinità e potranno anche ripresentarsi, senza essere distrutti per sempre.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: En Revolutions, podrías llegar a pensar que la derrota es el final de una civilización y su líder. ¡Pero puede que no! Sus líderes podrían esconderse y emerger de nuevo pasado un tiempo en vez de ser destruidos por el fin de los días.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: In Revolutions, you may think that it is the end for a leader and a nation if they are defeated. But it may not be! Leaders will go underground and re-emerge rather than be destroyed for all time.

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you want to conquest an enemy, make sure you get every last one of them! Even a single remainder can re-emerge as a resistance movement!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Si vous voulez conquérir un ennemi, soyez sûrs vous l'avez eu jusqu'au dernier! Parfois, un seul survivant peut faire réapparaître en mouvement de résistance!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you want to conquest an enemy, make sure you get every last one of them! Even a single remainder can re-emerge as a resistance movement!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Se vuoi conquistare un nemico, devi essere certo di eliminarne tutte le unità! Anche da un piccolo residuo può riemergere un movimento di resistenza!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Si quieres conquistar a un enemigo, asegúrate de que acabas con todos ellos. Un solo recordatorio de su civilización y ¡puedes encontrarte lidiando con un movimiento de resistencia!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you want to conquest an enemy, make sure you get every last one of them! Even a single remainder can re-emerge as a resistance movement!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: A cultural victory strategy has a spin off in Revolutions. The people will love you and you may wait for rival super powers to implode...
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: La Stratégie de Victoire culturelle a un avantage dans Revolutions. Le Peuple va vous adorer et vous pouvez toujours attendre les 'Super pouvoirs' de vos rivaux pour faire imploser votre Empire...
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: A cultural victory strategy has a spin off in Revolutions. The people will love you and you may wait for rival super powers to implode...
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Una strategia per la vittoria culturale in 'Revolutions' porta anche ad un altro scenario. Il popolo ti amerà e potrai attendere la caduta delle superpotenze rivali...
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Conseguir la victoria cultural en Revolutions puede tener un interesante escenario. Deja a la gente que te adore y espera a que las súper potencias rivales implosionen bajo su propio peso...
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: A cultural victory strategy has a spin off in Revolutions. The people will love you and you may wait for rival super powers to implode...

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If word spreads that an empire has collapsed into anarchy and rebellion, try to exploit it. These foreign citizens can be won over to your cause more easily than if you were to conquest that empire.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Si vous entendez des rumeurs d'un Empire en train de s'effondrer dans l'anarchie et la rebellion, essayez de l'exploiter. Ces étrangers peuvent être gagnés à votre cuse plus facilement que la conquête d'un Empire uni.
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If word spreads that an empire has collapsed into anarchy and rebellion, try to exploit it. These foreign can be won over to your cause more easily than if you were to conquest that empire.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Se ti giunge voce che un impero è sprofondato in anarchia e rivolta, cerca di attaccarlo. E' più facile guadagnare il supporto di questi popoli in rivolta che conquistare l'impero organizzato.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *:Si se extiende el rumor de que un imperio ha caído en la anarquía y la revolución, intenta sacar taja de ello. Los ciudadanos extranjeros podrían ser camelados a tu causa más fácilmente que si tuvieras que conquistar ese imperio al completo.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If word spreads that an empire has collapsed into anarchy and rebellion, try to exploit it. These foreign citizens can be won over to your cause more easily than if you were to conquest that empire.

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Without question, capturing cities and holding them is more difficult in Revolutions. Military strategy must always keep in mind long term domestic stability of newly acquired territories.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Sans aucun doute, capturer des Villes et le conserver est plus difficile dans Revolutions. A la stratégie militaire doit toujours être associée une volonté de prendre en compte à long terme la stabilité des territoires nouvellement acquis.
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Without question, capturing cities and holding them is more difficult in Revolutions. Military strategy must always keep in mind long term domestic stability of newly acquired territories.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Certamente, catturare e mantenere città è più difficile in 'Revolutions'. La strategia militare deve tenere conto della stabilità interna a lungo termine dei territori appena conquistati.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *:Sin lugar a dudas, capturar ciudades y mantenerlas es mucho más difícil en Revolutions. La estrategia militar siempre debe tener presente la estabilidad interna a largo plazo de los nuevos territorios conquistados.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Without question, capturing cities and holding them is more difficult in Revolutions. Military strategy must always keep in mind long term domestic stability of newly acquired territories.

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: A long term unstable settlement along way from home is not a bad thing. So long as there is strong military presence, medium term cycles of anarchy are manageable.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Une Ville Distante régulièrement instable n'est pas forcément une mauvaise chose. Tant qu'il y a une présence militaire importante, des cycles moyens d'anrachie sont 'gérables'.
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: A long term unstable settlement along way from home is not a bad thing. So long as there is strong military presence, medium term cycles of anarchy are manageable.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: L'instabilità perdurante di un insediamento lontano non è una cosa negativa. Finché vi è una forte presenza militare, brevi periodi di anarchia sono gestibili.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Un asentamiento lejano e inestable no es una cosa negativa. Mientras mantenga una fuerza militar considerable, breves periodos de anarquía intermitente son manejables.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: A long term unstable settlement along way from home is not a bad thing. So long as there is strong military presence, medium term cycles of anarchy are manageable.

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Distant holy city sites are always going to be tricky to hold unless you concede at least in part, to the faith of that city.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Une Ville Sainte Distante va être toujours parituclièrement difficile à maintenir, sauf si vous concédez au moins un point, la foi dans cette ville.
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Distant holy city sites are always going to be tricky to hold unless you concede at least in part, to the faith of that city.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Una Città Santa lontana dalla capitale sarà difficile da mantenere, a meno che non ne ammetterai la fede - almeno in parte.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Las Ciudades Santas lejanas siempre van a ser un poco difíciles de mantener a menos que permitas un poco al menos, la fe de esa ciudad.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Distant holy city sites are always going to be tricky to hold unless you concede at least in part, to the faith of that city.

TEXT.English: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: It is not always wise to eliminate every last barbarian city before they evolve into minor civs. You may need trading partners!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Civ. Barbare*: Ce n'est pas toujours le meilleur choix d'éliminer les villes barbares pour les empêcher d'évoluer en civilisations mineures. Vous aurez peut-être besoin de partenaires pour le commerce!
TEXT.German: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: It is not always wise to eliminate every last barbarian city before they evolve into minor civs. You may need trading partners!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento da 'Barbarian Civ'*: Non è sempre saggio eliminare fino all' ultima città barbarica, prima che si evolva in civiltà minori. Potresti avere bisogno di partner commerciali!
TEXT.Spanish: *Barbarian Civ Hint*:No siempre es buena idea eliminar toda ciudad bárbara antes de que evolucionen en civilizaciones menores. ¡Puedes llegar a necesitar socios comerciales!
TEXT.Finnish: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: It is not always wise to eliminate every last barbarian city before they evolve into minor civs. You may need trading partners!

TEXT.English: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: Start a game with only yourself! Competitors will emerge. Just make sure you turn off conquest and domination victory conditions!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Civ. Barbare*: Démarrez une partie tout seul! Les adversaires viendront progressivement. Il faut juste désactiver alors les victoires par conquête ou domination!
TEXT.German: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: Start a game with only yourself! Competitors will emerge. Just make sure you turn off conquest and domination victory conditions!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento da 'Barbarian Civ'*: Puoi iniziare una partita con solo te, come giocatore! I tuoi rivali compariranno. Solo fa' in modo togliere 'Conquista' e 'Dominazione' dalle condizioni di vittoria!
TEXT.Spanish: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: ¡Comienza una partida tu solo como jugador! Los rivales irán apareciendo. Asegúrate que desactivas las victorias por Conquista y Dominación previamente.
TEXT.Finnish: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: Start a game with only yourself! Competitors will emerge. Just make sure you turn off conquest and domination victory conditions!

TEXT.English: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: If a barbarian city emerges as a minor civilization, don't despair. Farm them accordingly and pounce on them if they are weak, for more rewards than if they had remained as barbarians!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Civ. Barbare*: Si une Ville barbare évolue en civilisation mineure, ne soyez pas désespéré. Accueillez-les et exploitez-les s'ils sont faibles. Cela vous rapportera plus que s'ils étaient resté barbares!
TEXT.German: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: If a barbarian city emerges as a minor civilization, don't despair. Farm them accordingly and pounce on them if they are weak, for more rewards than if they had remained as barbarians!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento da 'Barbarian Civ'*: Se una città barbarica si evolve in una Civiltà Minore, non disperare. Saccheggiali di conseguenza e attaccali se sono deboli, con un bottino maggiore di quello ricavato se fossero rimasti barbari!
TEXT.Spanish: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: Si una ciudad bárbara se convierte de civilización menor, no desesperes. Coséchala adecuadamente y abalánzate sobre ellos si son débiles, consiguiendo más beneficios que si hubieran permanecido como barbaros.
TEXT.Finnish: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: If a barbarian city emerges as a minor civilization, don't despair. Farm them accordingly and pounce on them if they are weak, for more rewards than if they had remained as barbarians!

TEXT.English: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: Barbarians evolve into minor civilizations. Minor civilizations evolve into full blooded civilizations. At each stage, they get stronger, economically and militarily.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Civ. Barbare*: Les Barbares évoluent en civilisations mineurs, puis en vraies Civilisations. A chaque étapes, il deviennent plus forts, économiquement et militairement.
TEXT.German: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: Barbarians evolve into minor civilizations. Minor civilizations evolve into full blooded civilizations. At each stage, they get stronger, economically and militarily.
TEXT.Italian: *MOD Barbarian Civ Hint*: I Barbari si evolvono in Civiltà Minori. Civiltà Minori si evolvono in vere Civiltà. Ad ogni passaggio, diventano sempre più forti economicamente e militarmente.
TEXT.Spanish: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: Las ciudades bárbaras evolucionan en civilizaciones menores. Las civilizaciones menores evolucionan a civilizaciones completas. En cada fase, se vuelven más fuertes, económica y militarmente.
TEXT.Finnish: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: Barbarians evolve into minor civilizations. Minor civilizations evolve into full blooded civilizations. At each stage, they get stronger, economically and militarily.

TEXT.English: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: If you are all alone on a continent, encourage not just one minor nation to emerge, but at least a third. You may need to trade in a tri-pact relationship. Binary pacts rarely work.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Civ. Barbare*: Si vous êtes seuls sur un continent, n'encouragez pas juste l'émergence d'une seule nation mineure, mais au moins deux. Les relations binaires ne marchent que rarement.
TEXT.German: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: If you are all alone on a continent, encourage not just one minor nation to emerge, but at least a third. You may need to trade in tri-pact relationship. Binary pacts rarely work.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento da 'Barbarian Civ'*: Se sei solo in un continente, spingi per la formazione non di una sola nazione minore, ma almeno di un'altra. Potresti aver bisogno di scambi triangolari. Raramente i patti a due funzionano.
TEXT.Spanish: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: Si te encuentras solo en un continente, deja al menos a un par de ciudades bárbaras que evolucionen en civilizaciones. Puedes necesitar que el comercio se desarrolle a tres bandas. Los pactos entre dos difícilmente funcionaran.
TEXT.Finnish: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: If you are all alone on a continent, encourage not just one minor nation to emerge, but at least a third. You may need to trade in tri-pact relationship. Binary pacts rarely work.

TEXT.English: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: If a minor civ emerges in your region, be warned that your outlying settlements may begin to become more loyal to them, not you!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Civ. Barbare*: Si une Civ mineure émerge dans votre région, il y a un risque pour que vos Villes aux frontières deviennent plus loyales envers eux!
TEXT.German: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: If a minor civ emerges in your region, be warned that your outlying settlements may begin to become more loyal to them, not you!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento da 'Barbarian Civ'*: Se una Civiltà Minore appare nella tua regione, attento: i tuoi insediamenti periferici possono cominciare a diventare più fedeli ad essa!
TEXT.Spanish: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: Si una civilización menor aparece en tu región, estate preparado ya que tus ciudades periféricas pueden empezar a ser más leales hacia ella.
TEXT.Finnish: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: If a minor civ emerges in your region, be warned that your outlying settlements may begin to become more loyal to them, not you!

TEXT.English: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: The emergence of minor civs with capable armies may appear unfair, but remember that they need something to ensure a chance of long term survival.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Civ. Barbare*: L'émergence de civilisation mineures avec une puissante armée peut apparaître injuste, mais noubliez-pas qu'il leur faut un minimum pour avoir une chance de survie à long terme.
TEXT.German: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: The emergence of minor civs with capable armies may appear unfair, but remember that they need something to ensure a chance of long term survival.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento da 'Barbarian Civ'*: La nascita di Civiltà Minori con forze militari può sembrare ingiusta, ma ricorda che hanno bisogno di qualcosa che garantisca loro la possibilità di una lunga sopravvivenza.
TEXT.Spanish: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: La aparición de civilizaciones menores con ejércitos listos para el combate puede parecer injusto y desproporcionado, pero recuerda que necesitan algo para asegurar la supervivencia a largo plazo.
TEXT.Finnish: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: The emergence of minor civs with capable armies may appear unfair, but remember that they need something to ensure a chance of long term survival.

TEXT.English: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: A minor civ does all the things a full civ does, but is more primitive in sophistication. A minor civ is insular and will not talk with you for example.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Civ. Barbare*: Une Civilisation mineure fait la même chose qu'une Civilisation normale, mais de manière plus primitive. Elle est plus réservé et ne va pas vnir vous parler par exemple.
TEXT.German: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: A minor civ does all the things a full civ does, but is more primitive in sophistication. A minor civ is insular and will not talk with you for example.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento da 'Barbarian Civ'*: Una Civiltà Minore fa tutto quello che fa una Civiltà completa, ma è più primitiva. Ad esempio una Civiltà Minore è insulare e non comunicherà con te.
TEXT.Spanish: *Barbarian Civ Hint*:Una civilización menor hace todas las cosas que una civilización completa, pero es más primitiva en sofisticación. Una civilización menor es insular y no hablara contigo, por ejemplo.
TEXT.Finnish: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: A minor civ does all the things a full civ does, but is more primitive in sophistication. A minor civ is insular and will not talk with you for example.

TEXT.English: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: Yes it is irritating if a minor civ settles vast fields of wild dye, leaving you without!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Civ. Barbare*: Oui, c'est irritant, lorsqu'une civilisation mineure s'établit, de vastes étendues de nature sauvage disparaîssent sous vos yeux!
TEXT.German: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: Yes it is irritating if a minor civ settles vast fields of wild dye, leaving you without!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento da 'Barbarian Civ'*: Sì, è irritante se un una Civiltà Minore riesce a prendere il controllo di una risorsa, lasciando te senza!
TEXT.Spanish: *Barbarian Civ Hint*:Si, es irritante si una civilización menor se asienta sobre vasto campos de tintura, ¡dejándote a ti sin ello!
TEXT.Finnish: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: Yes it is irritating if a minor civ settles vast fields of wild dye, leaving you without!

TEXT.English: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: New world maps are great. The old world you are on will one day discover a fully viable new world that has evolved of itself.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Civ. Barbare*: Les Cartes avec un 'nouveau monde' sont intéressantes. L'ancien monde dans lequel vous êtes va un jour découvrir un nouveau monde viable qui a évolué tout seul.
TEXT.German: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: New world maps are great. The old world you are on will one day discover a fully viable new world that has evolved of itself.
TEXT.Italian: *MOD Barbarian Civ Hint*: Le mappe con il 'Nuovo Mondo' sono grandi. Il 'Vecchio Mondo', nel quale ti trovi, un giorno scoprirà un 'Nuovo Mondo' completamente attivo, che si è evoluto da solo.
TEXT.Spanish: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: Los mapas del Nuevo Mundo son grandes. El Viejo Mundo en el que estás un día descubrirá un Nuevo Mundo completamente viable que ha evolucionado por sí solo.
TEXT.Finnish: *Barbarian Civ Hint*: New world maps are great. The old world you are on will one day discover a fully viable new world that has evolved of itself.

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Try the game options "Start as Minors". If you like early warfare, it is the option of choice!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: essayez l'option "Démarrage Barbare". Si vous aimez les guerres primitives, cette option est faite pour vous!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Try the game options "Start as Minors". If you like early warfare, it is the option of choice!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Prova l'opzione "Start as Minors". Se ti piace combattere nelle fasi iniziali, sarà la tua scelta preferita!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Prueba la opción "Comenzar como Menor". Si te gusta guerra de épocas tempranas, ¡esta es tu elección!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Try the game options "Start as Minors". If you like early warfare, it is the option of choice!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: There is no conspiracy in the "Start as Minors" option. You will make friends if you are influential enough!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Il n'y a pas de conspiration avec l'option "Démarrage Barbare". Vous vous ferez des amis si vous êtes assez influents!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: There is no conspiracy in the "Start as Minors" option. You will make friends if you are influential enough!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Non c'è un complotto nella opzione "Start as Minors". Ti farai amici solo se sei abbastanza influente!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: No hay conspiraciones en la opción "Comenzar como Menor". ¡Harás amigos si eres lo suficientemente influyente!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: There is no conspiracy in the "Start as Minors" option. You will make friends if you are influential enough!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Lacking a little spice in your life? Try "Start as Minors" with "Aggressive AI". That should do it!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Un peu de piment dans votre vie ? Essayez "Démarrage Barbare" avec "IA Aggressive". Ca pourrait le faire!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Lacking a little spice in your life? Try "Start as Minors" with "Aggressive AI". That should do it!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Vuoi un po' di pepe nella tua vita? Prova le opzioni "Start as Minors" assieme a "Aggressive AI". Vedrai!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: ¿Te falta un poco de picante en tu vida? Prueba "Comenzar como Menor" junto con "IA Agresiva". Ya verás la que te espera.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Lacking a little spice in your life? Try "Start as Minors" with "Aggressive AI". That should do it!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Revolutions games are more interesting and diverse than standard games. It is well worth writing down your game history turn by turn, in the autolog with the [ALT E] keystroke.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Les Parties de Revolutions sont plus intéressantes et diverses que les parties standard. C'est tout à fair intéressant d'écrire votre Histoire tout après tour, en utilisant les fonctions d'autolog - touches [ALT E].
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Revolutions games are more interesting and diverse than standard games. It is well worth writing down your game history turn by turn, in the autolog with the [ALT E] keystroke.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Le partite in 'Revolutions' sono più interessanti e varie rispetto al gioco standard. Vale la pena scrivere la storia della tua partita turno per turno: con l'autolog, utilizzando la combinazione [ALT+E].
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Las partidas de Revolutions son mas interesantes y diversas que las partidas estándar. Vale la pena ir escribiendo la historia de la partida turno a turno, utilizando el autolog con la combinación [ALT E] para ir anotando.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Revolutions games are more interesting and diverse than standard games. It is well worth writing down your game history turn by turn, in the autolog with the [ALT E] keystroke.

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Hereditary Rule is not necessarily the answer to all your revolt problems! The character of this political system will mean that war will have to be more carefully thought out to win your kingdom's support.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: La règle héréditaire n'est pas forcément la réponse à tous vos problèmes de révolte! La caractéristique de ce système politique peut entraîner des difficultés pour obtenir le soutien du peuple en cas de guerre.
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Hereditary Rule is not necessarily the answer to all your revolt problems! The character of this political system will mean that war will have to be more carefully thought out to win your kingdom's support.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: il 'Governo Ereditario' non è necessariamente la risposta ai tuoi problemi di rivolte! Il carattere di questo sistema politico implica dovrai attentamente valutare l'entrata in guerra, per ottenere il sostegno tuo regno.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *:El Gobierno Hereditario no es necesariamente la solución a tus problemas con las revueltas. El fundamento de este sistema político implica que la guerra debe ser planificada cuidadosamente para conseguir el apoyo de tu reino.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Hereditary Rule is not necessarily the answer to all your revolt problems! The character of this political system will mean that war will have to be more carefully thought out to win your kingdom's support.

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Despotism is a viable option! A despot has less ethical issues to deal with so long as his people can be kept in the dark about them! A despot can win wars when a King cannot!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Le Despotisme est une option viable! Un despote a moins de problème d'éthique tant que le peuple est maintenu dans l'obscurité sur ces sujets. Un despote peut gagner des guerres qu'un Roi ne pourrait pas!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Despotism is a viable option! A despot has less ethical issues to deal with so long as his people can be kept in the dark about them! A despot can win wars when a King cannot!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Il 'Dispotismo' è una scelta valida! Un despota ha meno problemi etici da affrontare finché il popolo ne viene lasciato all'oscuro! Un despota è in grado di vincere guerre che un re non può!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: ¡El Despotismo es una opción viable! Un déspota tiene menos trabas éticas con las que lidiar, mientras que su pueblo pueda ser mantenido en la ignorancia sobre estas prácticas. ¡Un déspota puede ganar guerras que un Rey no podría!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Despotism is a viable option! A despot has less ethical issues to deal with so long as his people can be kept in the dark about them! A despot can win wars when a King cannot!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Pay particular attention to the labour reforms your society adopts. It is these that the people must work under!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Faites attention aux réformes de travail que votre société adopte. Ce sont celles-ci qui concernent directement votre peuple!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Pay particular attention to the labour reforms your society adopts. It is these that the people must work under!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Presta particolare attenzione alle politiche del lavoro che adotta la tua società. Sono quelle che dovrà seguire la tua gente!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Presta particular atención a las reformas laborales que tu sociedad adopte. ¡Tu pueblo tendrá que trabajar bajo ellas!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Pay particular attention to the labour reforms your society adopts. It is these that the people must work under!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: The Sevopedia now displays revolutions specific civic effects and leader traits can be customised for revolution effects!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: La Sevopedia affiche à présent les effets des doctrines et traits de caractères qui ont des effets sur la stabilité!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: The Sevopedia now displays revolutions specific civic effects and leader traits can be customised for revolution effects!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: La Sevopedia ora mostra gli effetti, specifici per le rivoluzioni, delle forme di governo, e ora i 'punti di forza' dei Leader possono essere personalizzati per gli effetti rivoluzionari!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: La Sevopedia muestra los efectos de los Principios sobre las revoluciones específicamente y los rasgos de los lideres que pueden ser personalizados.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: The Sevopedia now displays revolutions specific civic effects and leader traits can be customised for revolution effects!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Don't be scared to run slavery! The citizens will endure the whipping.....for a time!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Ne soyez pas effrayés par l'esclavage! Les citoyens vont endurer le fouet.....pour un temps!
