TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Don't be scared to run slavery! The citizens will endure the whipping.....for a time!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Non abbiate paura di imporre lo Schiavismo! I cittadini sapranno sopportare le frustate..... per un po'!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: ¡No tengas miedo de adoptar la Esclavitud! Los ciudadanos podrán soporta los latigazos.... ¡al menos durante un tiempo!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Don't be scared to run slavery! The citizens will endure the whipping.....for a time!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Really, in a diverse religious state, you wouldn't run organised religion, would you?
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Réellement, dans un état avec une diversité religieuse, vous ne pourriez pas instaurer la religion organisé et une seul religion d'état, ou bien ?
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Really, in a diverse religious state, you wouldn't run organised religion, would you?
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: In effetti, in uno stato con differenti religioni, non sceglierai la forma di governo 'Religione Organizzata', vero?
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *:De verdad, en un estado con diversidad religiosa, no tiene sentido adoptar la Religión Organizada, en serio.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Really, in a diverse religious state, you wouldn't run organised religion, would you?

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you really want democracy, have it! But reform doesn't end there!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Si vous voulez absolument la démocracie, mettez-la en place! Mais les réformes ne s'arrêtent pas là!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you really want democracy, have it! But reform doesn't end there!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Se desideri veramente la democrazia, mettila in pratica! Ma le riforme non si limitano a questo!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *:Si de verdad quieres la Democracia, ¡tenla! Pero las reformas no deberían acabar ahí.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you really want democracy, have it! But reform doesn't end there!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Switching to a police state may be good at times of instability! How else can you keep the empire under your thumb?
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Instaurer un état policier peut être judicieux lorsque votre empire est trop instable. Comment sinon conserver l'Empire sous votre talon?
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Switching to a police state may be good at times of instability! How else can you keep the empire under your thumb?
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Il passaggio ad uno Stato di Polizia può essere positivo in tempi di instabilità! In quale altro modo puoi tenere in pugno l'impero?
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Cambiar a un Estado Policial puede estar bien en tiempos de inestabilidad. ¿Como si no vas a mantener a tu Imperio sometido?
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Switching to a police state may be good at times of instability! How else can you keep the empire under your thumb?

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: There is nothing more fun than to slowly destabilise a super power by stagnating it, and to grab the spoils when it implodes!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Il n'y a rien de plus amusant que de déstabiliser lentement une super puissance en la faisant stagner, et de récupérer les restes lorsqu'elle implose!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: There is nothing more fun than to slowly destabilise a super power by stagnating it, and to grab the spoils when it implodes!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Non c'è niente di più divertente che destabilizzare lentamente una superpotenza, fermandone lo sviluppo, ed infine raccoglierne i resti quando crolla!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: No hay nada más divertido que desestabilizar a una súper potencia poco a poco estancándola, ¡y luego recoger los trocitos cuando implosione!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: There is nothing more fun than to slowly destabilise a super power by stagnating it, and to grab the spoils when it implodes!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Che Guevara is the symbol for this mod! Play the game like he did, and you should be fine!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Che Guevara est l'icone de ce mod! Jouez le jeu comme il l'aurait fait, et tout devrait aller bien!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Che Guevara is the symbol for this mod! Play the game like he did, and you should be fine!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Che Guevara è il simbolo di questo MOD! Gioca la partita come avrebbe fatto lui, e tutto andrà bene!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Che Guevara es el símbolo de este Mod. Juega la partida como lo haría él, ¡y todo irá sobre ruedas!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Che Guevara is the symbol for this mod! Play the game like he did, and you should be fine!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you are sick of constant rebellious uprisings against you, don't forget [CTRL-SHIFT-L] and you can switch over to the rebels side!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Si vous êtes malade de la rebellion qui gagne constament du terrain contre vous, n'oubliez pas [CTRL-SHIFT-L] qui vous permet de passer du côté des forces rebelles!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you are sick of constant rebellious uprisings against you, don't forget [CTRL-SHIFT-L] and you can switch over to the rebels side!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Se sei stufo di continue rivolte contro di te, non dimenticare che [CTRL-SHIFT-L] ti consente di passare dalla parte dei ribelli!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Si estas harto de las constantes rebeliones en tus dominios, no olvides que con [CTRL-SHIFT-L] ¡puedes cambiarte al lado rebelde!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you are sick of constant rebellious uprisings against you, don't forget [CTRL-SHIFT-L] and you can switch over to the rebels side!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you think about it, a mod that makes the game more difficult like Revolutions, also makes the game more rewarding...
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Si vous y réfléchissez, un mod comme Revolutions qui rend le jeu plus difficile rend également la victoire plus gratifiante...
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you think about it, a mod that makes the game more difficult like Revolutions, also makes the game more rewarding...
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Se ci pensi, un MOD che rende il gioco più difficile come 'Revolutions', lo rende anche più gratificante...
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Si lo piensas un poquito, un Mod que hace el juego más complicado como Revolutions, también hace que la experiencia sea más gratificante...
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you think about it, a mod that makes the game more difficult like Revolutions, also makes the game more rewarding...

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you have stabilised your domestic society and you are the leader the people want, any standard BTS strategy is available for you to implement.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Si vous avez stabilisé votre société et que vous êtes le leader que le peuple souhaite, n'importe laquelle des stratégies de BTS s'offre à vous.
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you have stabilised your domestic society and you are the leader the people want, any standard BTS strategy is available for you to implement.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Se hai stabilizzato la tua civiltà e sei il leader che il popolo desidera, puoi attuare tutte le strategie definite per BtS.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Si has conseguido estabilizar tus asuntos internos y eres el líder que la gente quiere, cualquier estrategia estándar de BTS funcionara a las mil maravillas.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you have stabilised your domestic society and you are the leader the people want, any standard BTS strategy is available for you to implement.

TEXT.English: *DCM Hint*: Catapults cannot range bombard.
TEXT.French: *Conseils DCM*: Les Catapultes ne peuvent pas bombarder à distance.
TEXT.German: *DCM Hint*: Catapults cannot range bombard.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento da MOD 'RevDCM'*: Le catapulte non possono effettuare il 'Bombardamento ad Area'.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos DCM*: Las catapultas no pueden realizar Ataque a Distancia.
TEXT.Finnish: *DCM Hint*: Catapults cannot range bombard.

TEXT.English: *DCM Hint*: Range bombarding cities has a slightly different effect to bombarding them directly. Range bombarding aims fire at the defenders of the city as well as the defences!
TEXT.French: *Conseils DCM*: Le Bombardement à distance des Villes a un effet relativement différent que le bombardement direct. Le bombardement à distance vise à la fois les défenseurs de la Villes et ses défenses!
TEXT.German: *DCM Hint*: Range bombarding cities has a slightly different effect to bombarding them directly. Range bombarding aims fire at the defenders of the city as well as the defences!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento da MOD 'RevDCM'*: Il 'Bombardamento ad Area' contro le città ha un effetto leggermente diverso dal bombardamento diretto. Il 'Bombardamento ad Area' ha come obbiettivo sia i difensori della città, che le sue difese!!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos DCM*: Realizar Ataque a Distancia sobre las ciudades tiene un efecto distinto que el bombardeo atacando directamente la ciudad. ¡El Ataque a Distancia afecta a los defensores de la ciudad así como a sus defensas!
TEXT.Finnish: *DCM Hint*: Range bombarding cities has a slightly different effect to bombarding them directly. Range bombarding aims fire at the defenders of the city as well as the defences!

TEXT.English: *DCM Hint*: Range bombarding cities has much less impact on the defenders than the defences of the city. Defenders can seek cover even behind damaged walls!....for a time...
TEXT.French: *Conseils DCM*: Le Bombardement à distance des Villes a beaucoup moins d'impact sur les défenseurs que sur les défenses. Ceux-ci peuvent chercher à se protéger derrière les ruines!....pour un temps...
TEXT.German: *DCM Hint*: Range bombarding cities has much less impact on the defenders than the defences of the city. Defenders can seek cover even behind damaged walls!....for a time...
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento da MOD 'RevDCM'*: Il 'Bombardamento ad Area' contro le città ha meno impatto sui difensori che sulle difese. I difensori possono cercare riparo anche dietro le mura danneggiate !.... per una sola volta ...
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos DCM*: Realizar Ataque a Distancia sobre las ciudades produce mucho menos impacto sobre los defensores que sobre las defensas. Los defensores pues buscar cobijo incluso detrás de las murallas dañadas, al menos durante un tiempo...
TEXT.Finnish: *DCM Hint*: Range bombarding cities has much less impact on the defenders than the defences of the city. Defenders can seek cover even behind damaged walls!....for a time...

TEXT.English: *DCM Hint*: If you want to take down a cities defences at maximum thrift, just straight bombard the city defences and leave the defenders until there is no where for them to hide.
TEXT.French: *Conseils DCM*: Si vous voulez abattre les défenses d'une ville le plus efficacement, Bomberez uniquement les défences, et laissez les défenseurs jusqu'à qu'ils n'aient plus d'endroit où se cacher.
TEXT.German: *DCM Hint*: If you want to take down a cities defences at maximum thrift, just straight bombard the city defences and leave the defenders until there is no where for them to hide.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento da MOD 'RevDCM'*: Se vuoi abbattere le difese cittadine con il minimo costo, colpisci solo le difese e lascia stare i difensori, finché non rimane nulla in cui nascondersi.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos DCM*: Si quieres tomar una ciudad con el mínimo esfuerzo, bombardea únicamente las defensas enemigas y deja a los defensores para el momento en que no tengan donde esconderse.
TEXT.Finnish: *DCM Hint*: If you want to take down a cities defences at maximum thrift, just straight bombard the city defences and leave the defenders until there is no where for them to hide.

TEXT.English: *DCM Hint*: If you are defending your precious city from an enemy stack, range bombard the attackers as best you can from inside the city, but remember that your accuracy is compromised by being behind city structures and impediments.
TEXT.French: *Conseils DCM*: If you are defending your precious city from an enemy stack, range bombard the attackers as best you can from inside the city, but remember that your accuracy is compromised by being behind city structures and impediments.
TEXT.German: *DCM Hint*: If you are defending your precious city from an enemy stack, range bombard the attackers as best you can from inside the city, but remember that your accuracy is compromised by being behind city structures and impediments.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento da MOD 'RevDCM'*: Se stai difendendo la tua preziosa città da un gruppo nemico, il più possibile usa il 'Bombardamento ad Area' dall'interno della città contro gli attaccanti, ma ricorda che le strutture cittadine ne diminuiscono la precisione.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos DCM*: Si te encuentras defendiendo una ciudad valiosa ante apilamiento enemigo, bombardea a los atacantes utilizando el Ataque a Distancia desde el interior de tus murallas, pero recuerda que la puntería se ve afectada negativamente al disparar detrás de edificios y otros impedimentos.
TEXT.Finnish: *DCM Hint*: If you are defending your precious city from an enemy stack, range bombard the attackers as best you can from inside the city, but remember that your accuracy is compromised by being behind city structures and impediments.

TEXT.English: *DCM Hint*: Properly set-up defensive structures like forts or field deployments with properly constructed frontlines, are by far the most effective way to range bombard.
TEXT.French: *Conseils DCM*: Placez bien les structures défensives comme les forts ou les barbelés pour en faire des lignes de front. C'est de loin la méthode la plus efficace pour utiliser le bombardement à distance en tout sécurité.
TEXT.German: *DCM Hint*: Properly set-up defensive structures like forts or field deployments with properly constructed frontlines, are by far the most effective way to range bombard.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento da MOD 'RevDCM'*: Strutture difensive ben approntate come forti o spiegamenti di forze ben impostati, sono di gran lunga il modo più efficace di difendersi dal 'Bombardamento ad Area'.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos DCM*: Desplegar adecuadamente tus unidades en la frontera junto a la buena ubicación de fuertes, son por descontado la forma más efectiva de utilizar el Ataque a distancia.
TEXT.Finnish: *DCM Hint*: Properly set-up defensive structures like forts or field deployments with properly constructed frontlines, are by far the most effective way to range bombard.

TEXT.English: *DCM Hint*: Range bombard now only issues standard BTS collateral damage upon stacks. It is completely useless against single units and siege as well as the head defender of the enemy stack.
TEXT.French: *Conseils DCM*: Le Bombardement à distance génère des dommages collatéraux uniquement sur des groupes d'unités. C'est complètement inefficace contre les unités seules ainsi que le meilleur défenseur du groupe.
TEXT.German: *DCM Hint*: Range bombard now only issues standard collateral damage upon stacks. It is completely useless against single units and siege as well as the head defender of the enemy stack.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento da MOD 'RevDCM'*: Il 'Bombardamento ad Area' provoca solo danni collaterali normali contro un gruppo. E' completamente inutile contro unità singole e d'assedio così come contro l'unità in prima linea del gruppo.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos DCM*: El Ataque a Distancia solo infringe el daño colateral sobre los apilamientos. Es completamente ineficaz contra unidades solas y contra armas de asedio, así como contra el principal defensor de un apilamiento.
TEXT.Finnish: *DCM Hint*: Range bombard now only issues standard BTS collateral damage upon stacks. It is completely useless against single units and siege as well as the head defender of the enemy stack.

TEXT.English: *DCM Hint*: When thinking about range bombardment and how it causes damage, imagine the battle scenario. Range bombard tends to hit the main throng of the enemy army, missing the frontline attackers and not reaching the counter siege at the rear!
TEXT.French: *Conseils DCM*: En pensant au bombardement à distance et à la façon dont les dommages sont causés, imaginez un scénario de bataille. Les bombardement ont tendance à frapper le gros des troupes, sans affecter l'avant garde qui attaque ni l'artillerie en arrière!
TEXT.German: *DCM Hint*: When thinking about range bombardment and how it causes damage, imagine the battle scenario. Range bombard tends to hit the main throng of the enemy army, missing the frontline attackers and not reaching the counter siege at the rear!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento da MOD 'RevDCM'*: Per comprendere il 'Bombardamento ad Area' e come provoca danni, immagina lo scenario di battaglia. Il 'Bombardamento ad Area' tende a colpire il grosso dell'esercito nemico, mancando la prima linea e senza raggiungere le unità di contrassedio nelle retrovie!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos DCM*: Cuando pienses en cómo funciona el Ataque a Distancia y como se calcula el daño que provoca, imagina el campo de batalla. El Ataque a Distancia tendera a impactar sobre el núcleo principal del ejército enemigo, dejando intacto la primera línea de defensa y las ultimas líneas en la retaguardia donde se encuentra la artillería enemiga.
TEXT.Finnish: *DCM Hint*: When thinking about range bombardment and how it causes damage, imagine the battle scenario. Range bombard tends to hit the main throng of the enemy army, missing the frontline attackers and not reaching the counter siege at the rear!

TEXT.English: *DCM Hint*: Range bombardment effect can be customised in GlobalDefinesAlt.xml
TEXT.French: *Conseils DCM*: les Effets du Bombardement à Distance peuvent être modifiés dans le fichier GlobalDefinesAlt.xml
TEXT.German: *DCM Hint*: Range bombardment effect can be customised in GlobalDefinesAlt.xml
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento da MOD 'RevDCM'*: Gli effetti del 'Bombardamento ad Area' possono essere personalizzati nel file 'GlobalDefinesAlt.xml'
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos DCM*: El efecto del Ataque a Distancia puede ser personalizado en el archivoGlobalDefinesAlt.xml
TEXT.Finnish: *DCM Hint*: Range bombardment effect can be customised in GlobalDefinesAlt.xml

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Try the Barbarian world option where barbs sometimes start with cities in place at game start! This can make them more competitive but also give you a nice early target for conquest!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Essayez l'option 'Monde Barbare', où les barbares possède des villes dès le début du jeu. Cela augmenta la compétition, mais permet également une cible à conquérir très tôt dans le jeu!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Try the Barbarian world option where barbs sometimes start with cities in place at game start! This can make them more competitive but also give you a nice early target for conquest!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Prova l'opzione 'Barbarian world' dove talvolta anche i barbari iniziano la partita con una città! Questo li renderà più pericolosi, ma vi darà anche un obiettivo da conquistare!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Prueba la opción Mundo Bárbaro donde los bárbaros comienzan la partida con ciudades establecidas. Esto les hace más competitivos aunque también te proporciona un objetivo muy atractivo para la conquista.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Try the Barbarian world option where barbs sometimes start with cities in place at game start! This can make them more competitive but also give you a nice early target for conquest!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Revolutions and it's components are configurable and customisable in Revolution.ini
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Revolutions et ses composants est configurable et personnalisable dans le fichier Revolution.ini
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Revolutions and it's components are configurable and customisable in Revolution.ini
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: 'Revolutions' e i suoi componenti sono configurabili e personalizzabili nel file 'Revolution.ini'
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Revolutions y sus componentes pueden ser configurados en el archivo Revolution.ini
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: Revolutions and it's components are configurable and customisable in Revolution.ini

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you want an interesting variation of Revolutions, that effectively turns down the overall difficulty of the mod, try the "Inquisitions" option or "Limited Religions" or both!
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Si vous voulez une variante intéressante de 'Révolution', qui réduit la difficulté du mod, essayez l'option 'Inquisition' ou 'Religions limitées', ou alors combinez les deux!
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you want an interesting variation of Revolutions, that effectively turns down the overall difficulty of the mod, try the "Inquisitions" option or "Limited Religions" or both!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: Se cerchi una variazione interessante di 'Revolutions', per diminuire realmente la difficoltà del MOD, prova le opzioni "Inquisizioni Limitate" "Religioni Limitate" or entrambe!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: Si quieres una interesante variación en Revolutions, que reduce ampliamente la dificultad general del juego, prueba las opciones "Inquisición" o "Religiones Limitadas"... ¡o ambas!
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: If you want an interesting variation of Revolutions, that effectively turns down the overall difficulty of the mod, try the "Inquisitions" option or "Limited Religions" or both!

TEXT.English: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: From most difficult to least difficult are: Straight Revolutions, Limited Religions or Inquisitions, Limited Religion and Inquisitions.
TEXT.French: *Conseil Mod Revolution*: Du plus difficile au plus facile : Revolutions, Religions limitées ou Inquisition, Religions limitées et Inquisition.
TEXT.German: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: From most difficult to least difficult are: Straight Revolutions, Limited Religions or Inquisitions, Limited Religion and Inquisitions.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Revolutions'*: In ordine di difficoltà decrescente ci sono: Rivoluzioni Complete, Religioni o Inquisizioni Limitate, Religioni E Inquisizioni Limitate.
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Mod Revolutions *: De más difícil a menos: Revolutions Completo, Religiones Limitadas o Inquisición, Religiones Limitadas e Inquisición.
TEXT.Finnish: *Revolutions Mod Hint*: From most difficult to least difficult are: Straight Revolutions, Limited Religions or Inquisitions, Limited Religion and Inquisitions.

TEXT.English: *Influence Driven War*: If you need to ensure you keep your borders intact, you may have to get out from behind city fortification and fight in the field!
TEXT.French: *Influence Driven War*: Si vous voulez être sûr de conserver vos frontières intactes, il vous faudra sortir des fortifications de vos Villes et vous battre sur le terrain!
TEXT.German: *Influence Driven War*: If you need to ensure you keep your borders intact, you may have to get out from behind city fortification and fight in the field!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento da MOD 'IDW'*: Se vuoi conservare intatti i tuoi confini, devi uscire dalla protezione delle tue fortezze e combattere sul campo!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos IDW*: Si quieres asegurar tus fronteras intactas, ¡vas a tener que salir de la ciudad y pelear en campo abierto!
TEXT.Finnish: *Influence Driven War*: If you need to ensure you keep your borders intact, you may have to get out from behind city fortification and fight in the field!

TEXT.English: *Influence Driven War*: If you have a choice of where you want to fight, pick a location that will be most useful to you so that if you win the battle, your influence around the battle region is good enough to keep the territory!
TEXT.French: *Influence Driven War*: Si vous pouvez choisir l'emplacement de vos batailles, choisissez un emplacement qui pourrait vous être utile, car en cas de victoire, votre influence pourrait vous faire gagner le territoire!
TEXT.German: *Influence Driven War*: If you have a choice of where you want to fight, pick a location that will be most useful to you so that if you win the battle, your influence around the battle region is good enough to keep the territory!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento da MOD 'IDW'*: Se puoi scegliere dove combattere, scegli il posto migliore in cui, in caso di vittoria, l'influenza culturale diventerà sufficiente a conquistare la casella!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos IDW*: Si puedes escoger donde pelear, elige una localización en la que si consigues ganar la batalla, tu influencia alrededor de la casilla es lo suficientemente alta como para mantener ese casilla.
TEXT.Finnish: *Influence Driven War*: If you have a choice of where you want to fight, pick a location that will be most useful to you so that if you win the battle, your influence around the battle region is good enough to keep the territory!

TEXT.English: *Influence Driven War*: Keep an eye out for the culture mix of the tile you are contesting. It is possible that a 5% influence swing to you may be enough to win the territory!
TEXT.French: *Influence Driven War*: Gardez un oeil aux informations de culture des cases que vous revendiquez. Il est possible que seulement 5% de modifications de l'influence soient suffisants pour gagner le territoire!
TEXT.German: *Influence Driven War*: Keep an eye out for the culture mix of the tile you are contesting. It is possible that a 5% influence swing to you may be enough to win the territory!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento da MOD 'IDW'*: Attento alle influenze culturali di una casella da conquistare. E' possibile che una variazione del 5% dell'influenza culturale possa farti conquistare il territorio!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos IDW*: Mantén un ojo en la mezcla cultural de la casilla que estas disputando. ¡Es posible que con un pequeño cambio del 5% te otorgue el territorio!
TEXT.Finnish: *Influence Driven War*: Keep an eye out for the culture mix of the tile you are contesting. It is possible that a 5% influence swing to you may be enough to win the territory!

TEXT.English: *RevolutionDCM*: All game options are configurable within the user interface. Most are accessible via the BUG hot key [CTRL-ALT-O] under the "RevDCM" tab.
TEXT.French: *RevolutionDCM*: Toutes les options de jeu sont configurables via l'interface utilisateur. La plupart sont accessibles avec le Raccourci du menu BUG : [CTRL-ALT-O] sous l'onglet 'RevDCM'.
TEXT.German: *RevolutionDCM*: All game options are configurable within the user interface. Most are accessible via the BUG hot key [CTRL-ALT-O] under the "RevDCM" tab.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'RevDCM'*: Tutte le opzioni di gioco sono configurabili graficamente. La maggior parte sono accessibili con la hot key [CTRL-ALT-O] del MOD BUG nella scheda "RevDCM".
TEXT.Spanish: *RevolutionDCM*: Todas las opciones son configurables dentro de la interfaz. La mayoría son accesibles mediante la tecla [CTRL-ALT-O] y dentro de la pestaña "RevDCM".
TEXT.Finnish: *RevolutionDCM*: All game options are configurable within the user interface. Most are accessible via the BUG hot key [CTRL-ALT-O] under the "RevDCM" tab.

TEXT.English: *RevolutionDCM*: If you select the "debug" option under the RevDCM tab, game options will update on the next turn!
TEXT.French: *RevolutionDCM*: Si vous sélectionnez l'option "debug" de l'onglet RevDCM, les options de jeu vont être prises en compte au tour suivant!
TEXT.German: *RevolutionDCM*: If you select the "debug" option under the RevDCM tab, game options will update on the next turn!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'RevDCM'*: Se selezioni l'opzione "debug" nella cartella 'RevDCM', il prossimo turno saranno aggiornate le opzioni!
TEXT.Spanish: *RevolutionDCM*:Si seleccionas la opción "debug" en la pestaña RevDCM, las opciones de juegos se actualizaran en el próximo turno.
TEXT.Finnish: *RevolutionDCM*: If you select the "debug" option under the RevDCM tab, game options will update on the next turn!

TEXT.English: *RevolutionDCM*: Some game options like enabling or disabling Revolutions, can only be done at the start of a game in the custom game screen.
TEXT.French: *RevolutionDCM*: Certaines options de jeu (comme activer ou non Revolutions), peuvent oniquement être choisies lors du démarrage d'un jeu personnalisé.
TEXT.German: *RevolutionDCM*: Some game options like enabling or disabling Revolutions, can only be done at the start of a game in the custom game screen.
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'RevDCM'*: Alcune opzioni come attivare o disattivare 'Revolutions', possono essere selezionate solo all'inizio della partita nella schermata opzioni.
TEXT.Spanish: *RevolutionDCM*: Algunas opciones, como activar o desactivar Revolutions, solo se pueden hacer al inicio de la partida en la pantalla de opciones de juego.
TEXT.Finnish: *RevolutionDCM*: Some game options like enabling or disabling Revolutions, can only be done at the start of a game in the custom game screen.

TEXT.English: *Super Spies*: Be wary of counter espionage! AI's are very conscious about it against adversaries they do not trust. This will make you more vulnerable to espionage if ignored and more expensive for you to conduct!
TEXT.French: *Super Espions*: Faites attention au Contre-espionnage! l'IA est particulièrement attentive envers les adversaires qu'elle ne croit pas. Cela va vous rendre l'espionnage plus vulnérable si vous l'ignorez, et plus cher à conduire!
TEXT.German: *Super Spies*: Be wary of counter espionage! AI's are very conscious about it against adversaries they do not trust. This will make you more vulnerable to espionage if ignored and more expensive for you to conduct!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Super Spie'*: Attento al Controspionaggio! L'IA lo conosce bene e lo usa contro gli avversari di cui non si fida. Se lo trascuri, sarai più vulnerabile allo spionaggio nemico e il tuo sarà più costoso!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Súper Espías*: ¡Estate atento al contra espionaje! La IA sabe cómo usarlo y lo utilizara contra los adversarios en los que no confía. Esto te hará más vulnerable al espionaje si lo ignoras y será mucho más costoso para llevar a cabo.
TEXT.Finnish: *Super Spies*: Be wary of counter espionage! AI's are very conscious about it against adversaries they do not trust. This will make you more vulnerable to espionage if ignored and more expensive for you to conduct!

TEXT.English: *Super Spies*: Experiment with different combinations of spy promotions. Who knows, you might end up with your own James Bond!
TEXT.French: *Super Espions*: Expérimentez différentes combinaisons de promotions des espions. Qui sait, vous pourrez finir avec votre propre James Bond!
TEXT.German: *Super Spies*: Experiment with different combinations of spy promotions. Who knows, you might end up with your own James Bond!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Super Spie'*: Prova con diverse combinazioni di promozioni spia. Chi lo sa, potersti trovare il tuo James Bond!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Súper Espías*: Experimenta con diferentes combinaciones de ascensos para los espías. Quién sabe, ¡lo mismo acabas con tu propio James Bond!
TEXT.Finnish: *Super Spies*: Experiment with different combinations of spy promotions. Who knows, you might end up with your own James Bond!

TEXT.English: *Super Spies*: Once the era of bureaucratic espionage is possible, security bureau's and intelligence agencies matter!
TEXT.French: *Super Espions*: Dès que l'ère de l'espionage bueaucratique est possible, les bureaux de sécurité et les agences prennent de l'importance!
TEXT.German: *Super Spies*: Once the era of bureaucratic espionage is possible, security bureau's and intelligence agencies matter!
TEXT.Italian: *Suggerimento del MOD 'Super Spie'*: Quando diventa possibile lo spionaggio burocratico, 'Agenzia di Sicurezza' e 'Servizi Segreti' diventano importanti!
TEXT.Spanish: *Consejos Súper Espías*: Una vez que el espionaje burocrático es posible, ¡la Agencia de inteligencia y el Servicio de contraespionaje son muy importantes!
TEXT.Finnish: *Super Spies*: Once the era of bureaucratic espionage is possible, security bureau's and intelligence agencies matter!
